NPC.name: raptor girl
NPC.description: The raptor girls eyes you with a cunning and predatory look to her. Her entire body athletic, slender, swift and powerfully sleek. Her body mostly covered in brown scales on her limbs and much of her torso except for a subdued orange tone on the insides of her hands, feet and her front extending from her face down her neck and over her chest down to her mound. As for the rest of her from above her buttocks extends a reptilian tail, brown on top and orange below and her fingers and toes all end in claws.
